title: [BUG] Nested `MlflowException` when calling `mlflow.set_experiment()` on a RestStore endpoint that requires authentication

labels.name: area/tracking
labels.description: Tracking service, tracking client APIs, autologging

body:
### Willingness to contribute Yes. I would be willing to contribute a fix for this bug with guidance from the MLflow community. ### MLflow version mlflow, version 1.26.1 ### System information - **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: CentOS 8 - **Python version**: Python 3.9.12 - **yarn version, if running the dev UI**: ### Describe the problem **Note**: This might be not considered a bug but more of an improvement or optimization. When setting a RestStore that requires authentication but the credentials are NOT set: ```python mlflow.set_tracking_uri(mlflow_params.tracking_uri) # This endpoint requires auth try: mlflow.set_experiment(mlflow_params.experiment) except MlflowException as e: log.exception(msg="An error occurred while setting MLflow experiment") ``` The following nested exceptions occur: ```python-traceback ERROR:root:An error occurred while setting MLflow experiment Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/store/tracking/rest_store.py", line 285, in get_experiment_by_name response_proto = self._call_endpoint(GetExperimentByName, req_body) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/store/tracking/rest_store.py", line 56, in _call_endpoint return call_endpoint(self.get_host_creds(), endpoint, method, json_body, response_proto) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/utils/rest_utils.py", line 256, in call_endpoint response = verify_rest_response(response, endpoint) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/utils/rest_utils.py", line 191, in verify_rest_response raise MlflowException("%s. Response body: '%s'" % (base_msg, response.text)) mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException: API request to endpoint /api/2.0/mlflow/experiments/get-by-name failed with error code 401 != 200. Response body: ' 401 Authorization Required

401 Authorization Required

nginx/1.20.0
' During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/bruno/repos/my-repo/model/training.py", line 297, in train_model mlflow.set_experiment(mlflow_params.experiment) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/fluent.py", line 110, in set_experiment experiment = client.get_experiment_by_name(experiment_name) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/client.py", line 462, in get_experiment_by_name return self._tracking_client.get_experiment_by_name(name) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/_tracking_service/client.py", line 162, in get_experiment_by_name return self.store.get_experiment_by_name(name) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/store/tracking/rest_store.py", line 297, in get_experiment_by_name for experiment in self.list_experiments(ViewType.ALL): File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/store/tracking/rest_store.py", line 77, in list_experiments response_proto = self._call_endpoint(ListExperiments, req_body) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/store/tracking/rest_store.py", line 56, in _call_endpoint return call_endpoint(self.get_host_creds(), endpoint, method, json_body, response_proto) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/utils/rest_utils.py", line 256, in call_endpoint response = verify_rest_response(response, endpoint) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/utils/rest_utils.py", line 191, in verify_rest_response raise MlflowException("%s. Response body: '%s'" % (base_msg, response.text)) mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException: API request to endpoint /api/2.0/mlflow/experiments/list failed with error code 401 != 200. Response body: ' 401 Authorization Required

401 Authorization Required

nginx/1.20.0
' ``` As it can be seen the in the output above, an exception occurs as the first exception is being handled. The reason is that in `get_experiment_by_name()` in `mlflow/store/tracking/rest_store.py` [https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/mlflow/store/tracking/rest_store.py#L102](url) when the first exception is handled the code call `list_experiments()` that makes a second call to the API endpoint again raising the same exception a second time. IMHO, if the HTTP status returned by the call is not transient, the exception should be raised instead of trying to call `list_experiments()`. ### Tracking information _No response_ ### Code to reproduce issue ```python mlflow.set_tracking_uri(mlflow_params.tracking_uri) try: mlflow.set_experiment(mlflow_params.experiment) except MlflowException as e: log.exception(msg="An error occurred while setting MLflow experiment") ``` ### Other info / logs ```python-traceback ERROR:root:An error occurred while setting MLflow experiment Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/store/tracking/rest_store.py", line 285, in get_experiment_by_name response_proto = self._call_endpoint(GetExperimentByName, req_body) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/store/tracking/rest_store.py", line 56, in _call_endpoint return call_endpoint(self.get_host_creds(), endpoint, method, json_body, response_proto) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/utils/rest_utils.py", line 256, in call_endpoint response = verify_rest_response(response, endpoint) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/utils/rest_utils.py", line 191, in verify_rest_response raise MlflowException("%s. Response body: '%s'" % (base_msg, response.text)) mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException: API request to endpoint /api/2.0/mlflow/experiments/get-by-name failed with error code 401 != 200. Response body: ' 401 Authorization Required

401 Authorization Required

nginx/1.20.0
' During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/bruno/repos/my-repo/model/training.py", line 297, in train_model mlflow.set_experiment(mlflow_params.experiment) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/fluent.py", line 110, in set_experiment experiment = client.get_experiment_by_name(experiment_name) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/client.py", line 462, in get_experiment_by_name return self._tracking_client.get_experiment_by_name(name) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/_tracking_service/client.py", line 162, in get_experiment_by_name return self.store.get_experiment_by_name(name) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/store/tracking/rest_store.py", line 297, in get_experiment_by_name for experiment in self.list_experiments(ViewType.ALL): File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/store/tracking/rest_store.py", line 77, in list_experiments response_proto = self._call_endpoint(ListExperiments, req_body) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/store/tracking/rest_store.py", line 56, in _call_endpoint return call_endpoint(self.get_host_creds(), endpoint, method, json_body, response_proto) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/utils/rest_utils.py", line 256, in call_endpoint response = verify_rest_response(response, endpoint) File "/home/bruno/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-env/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/utils/rest_utils.py", line 191, in verify_rest_response raise MlflowException("%s. Response body: '%s'" % (base_msg, response.text)) mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException: API request to endpoint /api/2.0/mlflow/experiments/list failed with error code 401 != 200. Response body: ' 401 Authorization Required

401 Authorization Required

nginx/1.20.0
' ``` ### What component(s) does this bug affect? - [ ] `area/artifacts`: Artifact stores and artifact logging - [ ] `area/build`: Build and test infrastructure for MLflow - [ ] `area/docs`: MLflow documentation pages - [ ] `area/examples`: Example code - [ ] `area/model-registry`: Model Registry service, APIs, and the fluent client calls for Model Registry - [ ] `area/models`: MLmodel format, model serialization/deserialization, flavors - [ ] `area/projects`: MLproject format, project running backends - [ ] `area/scoring`: MLflow Model server, model deployment tools, Spark UDFs - [ ] `area/server-infra`: MLflow Tracking server backend - [X] `area/tracking`: Tracking Service, tracking client APIs, autologging ### What interface(s) does this bug affect? - [ ] `area/uiux`: Front-end, user experience, plotting, JavaScript, JavaScript dev server - [ ] `area/docker`: Docker use across MLflow's components, such as MLflow Projects and MLflow Models - [ ] `area/sqlalchemy`: Use of SQLAlchemy in the Tracking Service or Model Registry - [ ] `area/windows`: Windows support ### What language(s) does this bug affect? - [ ] `language/r`: R APIs and clients - [ ] `language/java`: Java APIs and clients - [ ] `language/new`: Proposals for new client languages ### What integration(s) does this bug affect? - [ ] `integrations/azure`: Azure and Azure ML integrations - [ ] `integrations/sagemaker`: SageMaker integrations - [ ] `integrations/databricks`: Databricks integrations
